title: Does JPMorgan, Morgan Stanley, or Goldman Sachs hire employees who have a year gap in academics? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes they do. But in order to get into them, with a gap in academics you’d have to show them that you did something productive during that time. It’s all about proving to them that you are the worthy candidate. Obviously, the above applies to a situation where your CV is selected and an interviewer asks the question about the gap. To get your CV selected by automated computers, CV should contain the credentials required by the computer.
